title: General
description: Great Job on your project so far, just a few more fixes and you will be ready to go :airplane:

title: IMPROVE README
description: Your README files clearly indicate how to install and run your app :star:, you could improve it even more including a description, licensing, contribution, among other things. Here's a great Udacity [README course](https://www.udacity.com/course/writing-readmes--ud777) to help you enhance your skills.

title: BindActionsCreators
description: You could connect the actions directly or through the [bindActionCreators](http://redux.js.org/docs/api/bindActionCreators.html) function provided by redux. This way you won't need to use this.props.dispatch to call your actions.

title: General(Awesome)
description:
Excellent :tada: Your hard work has paid off. The Book Lending App is working great.
Keep up the good work and best of lucks on your next project :star:
_Left you some comments that could help you improve your app even more!_
